text: Donald John Judson Aiken (January 1, 1932 - November 2, 2021) was an American ice hockey player. He played one game for the Montreal Canadiens in the National Hockey League between the 1957 and 1958 season. He was born in Arlington, Massachusetts. Aiken died on November 2, 2021 in Reading, Massachusetts at the age of 89.John J.
